The front left and back right modules have been moving really fast on startup and finds an angle and then it starts twitching back and forth very quickly. We believe this is a problem with the encoders as if we switch the absolutes in code for relative then it doesn’t do the same thing (but still doesn’t work correctly). We are using NEO vortexes with Spark Flex motor controllers, the absolute encoder is a \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eCTRE\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Cross The Road Electronics\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e CANcoder. We also started with the MAXSwerve template as a starting point and have been modifying from that.\u003cbr\u003e\nHere is a link to the code - \u003ca href=\"https://github.com/FHS-Robotics/2025\" class=\"inline-onebox\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eGitHub -
